description: Try our easy to follow Roast Rolled Pork Loin recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Rolled Pork Loin Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Saxa natural sea salt flakes

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C. Untie pork and lay flat, rind side up. Wipe rind with paper towel.
Using a sharp knife, score pork skin at 1cm intervals. Turn pork over and wipe with paper towel.

Combine orange rind and juice, chopped sage, salt and pepper. Rub meat with orange mixture. Combine figs, orange juice and sherry and spread over meat. Roll up pork firmly. Tie with cooking string to secure.
Rub skin with oil and sprinkle with sea salt flakes. Place pork onto a rack in a large greased baking dish.
Roast for 30 minutes. Reduce heat to 200°C. Roast pork for a further 1 hour.
Prepare gravy powder as per pack directions. Carve and serve with the gravy.
